reviews: Geforce now tem uma proposta interessante, de ser um aplicativo que se possa jogar seus jogos pela nuvem... Caso isso funcionasse como deveria. O pr√≥prio aplicativo impossibilita de jogar por conta de erros e bugs, no in√≠cio tudo √© bom, poucas filas com poucas pessoas.... Mas aos poucos a fila vai ficando imensa, mais de 700 pessoas, isso quando a fila n√£o congela em certo ponto, vc perde quase 1/2 horas para jogar 30 min. Sem contar os bugs que s√£o muitos. Tinha tudo para ser bom...
reviews_en: Geforce now has an interesting proposal, that of being an application where you can play your games via the cloud... If it works as it should. The application itself makes it impossible to play due to errors and bugs, in the beginning everything is good, few queues with few people.... But little by little the queue gets huge, more than 700 people, when the queue doesn't freeze at a certain point point, you lose almost 1/2 hour to play 30 min. Not to mention the many bugs. It had everything to be good...

reviews: O aplivativo √© bommm, mas as filas estragam esse app e o fato de sempre have problemas e erros de conex√£o com os servidores, RESOLVAM ISSO. Quase sempre tenho que fica entrando em filas novamente por causa de erros ou sa√≠das indesejadas dos jogos por causa de erros de conex√£o. Isso √© rid√≠culo e frustante principalmente quando voc√™ est√° em uma partida no jogo e acaba perdendo sem necessidade por falta de boa qualidade no servi√ßo do aplicativo. Apesar disso o app √© bom mas poderia ser melhor.ü§ôüèΩ
reviews_en: The app is good, but the queues ruin this app and the fact that there are always problems and errors connecting to the servers, FIX IT. I almost always have to keep getting queued up again because of errors or unwanted exits from games because of connection errors. This is ridiculous and frustrating, especially when you are in a game and end up losing unnecessarily due to the lack of good quality in the application's service. Despite this, the app is good but it could be better.ü§ôüèΩ

reviews: O aplicativo e bom mais alguns casos (tirado a fila grande na parte paga e erros de conex√£o). In other games, nothing strange happened to me. Thank for this APP creation and i know this aplication os under development. Here i leave my thougts of the APP
reviews_en: NVIDIA, the idea was great and the application is fantastic, however, when I enter the game "BeamNG.drive", I can't play for almost any time (usually), because certain computers have an antivirus (depending on the game) that closes the game and leaves the PC, having to wait again to be able to enter and have the same misfortune to happen. In other games, nothing strange happened to me. Thank you for this APP creation and i know this application as under development. Here I leave my thougts of the APP

reviews: Perfect! I paid R$ 240,00 for six months and I have a 7MB radio internet conection and still it works perfectly. I can play Road Redemption, CS:GO, Destiny, Ring Of Elysium, etc. all of them run smoothly on my tiny device with 2GB of ram, 32GB of storage and a CPU of only 1.44GHZ. Well what I can assure is that I will pay again when the six months end.
reviews_en: Perfect! I paid BRL 240.00 for six months and I have a 7MB radio internet connection and it still works perfectly. I can play Road Redemption, CS:GO, Destiny, Ring Of Elysium, etc. all of them run smoothly on my tiny device with 2GB of ram, 32GB of storage and a CPU of only 1.44GHZ. Well what I can assure is that I will pay again when the six months end.

Competition is offering click and play, it's the future, and what costumers want. Please correct the app or change access terms for nvidia shield users and I'll retify the evaluation.
reviews_en: I cannot provide more than 2 stars at the moment. I invested nearly 300$ dollars on the nvidia shield tv pro + nvidia controller and willing to pay a subscription for cloud gaming, and I'm still putting in a queue and having to log in all over, every time? Competition is offering click and play, it's the future, and what customers want. Please correct the app or change access terms for nvidia shield users and I'll rectify the evaluation.

reviews: App funciona muito bem. Infelizmente, para conseguir jogar com controle do PS4 tive que utilizar um cabo devido ao sistema da Xiaomi n√£o ter o driver bluetooth do controle (Por que!?). Enfim, o ponto negativo √© que o app n√£o se conecta com o console pela rede local e sim pela internet, o que pode gerar um delay e problemas de conex√£o se sua internet n√£o for r√°pida e est√°vel. Al√©m de n√£o poder jogar se sua internet cair...
reviews_en: App works great. Unfortunately, to be able to play with the PS4 controller I had to use a cable due to the Xiaomi system not having the controller's bluetooth driver (Why!?). Anyway, the downside is that the app does not connect to the console over the local network, but over the internet, which can cause a delay and connection problems if your internet is not fast and stable. In addition to not being able to play if your internet goes down...

reviews: O app quebra um galho, por√©m, est√° longe de ser √≥timo. Voc√™ passa mais tempo se estressando com ele do que se divertindo jogando. Conex√£o cai constantemente mesmo com uma velocidade de internet de 70MB e eu estando sozinho usando a Internet. A falta de op√ß√£o de personaliza√ß√£o dos controles na tela √© grotesca, voc√™ quer usar o anal√≥gico e fica tocando nas setas o tempo todo assim usando outras fun√ß√µes nos jogos que voc√™ n√£o gostaria de usar. Resolvendo estes problemas o App seria √≥timo.
reviews_en: The app breaks a branch, however, it is far from great. You spend more time stressing about it than having fun playing it. Connection drops constantly even with an internet speed of 70MB and I am alone using the internet. The lack of option to customize the controls on the screen is grotesque, you want to use the analog and keep tapping the arrows all the time thus using other functions in games that you would not want to use. Solving these problems the App would be great.

reviews: Muito boa a aplica√ß√£o! Sem problema algum, jogo com o comando conectado por bluetooth ao telem√≥vel, n√£o h√° falhar de internet mesmo estando em uma divis√£o bem afastada da PS4 e do router, h√° sim um ligeiro problema com o use de dois bot√µes quando utilizando o comando no ecr√£ e o fato de n√£o conseguir usar o touchpad quando o comando est√° conectado por bluetooth, mas ha alternativas! Mas simplesmente fant√°stica a aplica√ß√£o!
reviews_en: Very good application! No problem at all, I play with the controller connected via bluetooth to the mobile phone, there is no internet failure even though we are in a room far away from the PS4 and the router, there is a slight problem with the use of two buttons when using the controller on the screen and the fact of not being able to use the touchpad when the controller is connected via bluetooth, but there are alternatives! But simply fantastic application!

reviews: Faltam configura√ß√µes para o layout dos bot√µes na tela, os anal√≥gicos virtuais n√£o aparecem com o celular na horizontal, nem sempre voc√™ vai estar com o controle f√≠sico. A conex√£o √© perdida instantaneamente quando o aplicativo √© minimizado, podendo atrapalhar bastante a experi√™ncia.
reviews_en: Settings are missing for the layout of the buttons on the screen, the virtual analog sticks don't appear with the cell phone horizontal, you won't always have the physical control. The connection is instantly lost when the app is minimized, which can greatly disrupt the experience.

reviews: Definitely an amazing app, I can play on my phone at home or when I'm outside through Wi-Fi, both options being very reliable with no lag whatsoever which is an impressive feat. I'm giving you 2 stars only because of one problem which would be easily solvable if you wanted, dualshock support on all Android versions! I have a Mi 9T Pro phone with Android 10 which still doesn't let me use the controller, be it wirelessly or wired. Having that said, an open source app that allows remote play with PS4 (Chiaki, more specifically) allows you to use your dualshock on any version of Android and after that I realized Sony's just stubborn, they'd easily manage that too, and for that, I give you 2 stars, it's unacceptable that an open source app is doing better than the original owners just because they are stubborn. It's an error on your part, I can tell you that, more people would be playing if that was the case and that's what you want, am I not right?
reviews_en: Definitely an amazing app, I can play on my phone at home or when I'm outside through Wi-Fi, both options being very reliable with no lag whatsoever which is an impressive feat. I'm giving you 2 stars only because of one problem which would be easily solvable if you wanted, dualshock support on all Android versions! I have a Mi 9T Pro phone with Android 10 which still doesn't let me use the controller, be it wirelessly or wired. Having that said, an open source app that allows remote play with PS4 (Chiaki, more specifically) allows you to use your dualshock on any version of Android and after that I realized Sony's just stubborn, they'd easily manage that too, and for that, I give you 2 stars, it's unacceptable that an open source app is doing better than the original owners just because they are stubborn. It's an error on your part, I can tell you that, more people would be playing if that was the case and that's what you want, am I not right?

reviews: My Redmi Note 8 Pro, with Android 10, does not recognize my dualshock 4 as a compatible device. I connected them via bluetooth and tested with some apps from Playstore, and it should work. I Think PS4 remote play/smartphone sees the ds4 as a mouse because It recognizes whenever I swap my finger in the touchpad. A mouse cursor is shown.
reviews_en: My Redmi Note 8 Pro, with Android 10, does not recognize my dualshock 4 as a compatible device. I connected them via bluetooth and tested with some apps from Playstore, and it should work. I think PS4 remote play/smartphone sees the ds4 as a mouse because It recognizes whenever I swap my finger in the touchpad. A mouse cursor is shown.

reviews: Bonito, pr√°tico e atual. O Steam Link √© uma ferramenta que est√° em constante desenvolvimento, possui sempre atualiza√ß√µes importantes e procura ao m√°ximo se ajustar a necessidade que um smartphone exige. Controles de toque, mudan√ßa de resolu√ß√£o, qualidade da transmiss√£o, macro, suporte a controles f√≠sicos, possibilidade de usar o Remote Play Together. Ainda n√£o est√° perfeito, mas est√° no caminho certo e muito pr√°tico para uso di√°rio.
reviews_en: Beautiful, practical and current. Steam Link is a tool that is constantly being developed, always has important updates and tries its best to adjust to the needs that a smartphone requires. Touch controls, resolution switching, streaming quality, macro, support for physical controls, ability to use Remote Play Together. It's still not perfect, but it's on the right track and very practical for everyday use.

reviews: O app em si, no quesito fazer streaming de jogos via rede local, funciona e inclusive √© f√°cil de conectar ao computador. No entanto √© necess√°rio ter uma conex√£o muito r√°pida com a internet, livre de interfer√™ncias. A minha principal cr√≠tica a respeito desse app √© o fato de n√£o poder jogar os jogos da minha biblioteca steam fora de casa, o que √© uma pena, pois os meus jogos favoritos est√£o no meu computador. Uma sugest√£o √© dar a possibilidade de streaming via nuvem (servidor remoto).
reviews_en: The app itself, in terms of streaming games via the local network, works and is even easy to connect to the computer. However, it is necessary to have a very fast internet connection, free of interference. My main criticism of this app is the fact that I can't play the games in my steam library away from home, which is a shame as my favorite games are on my computer. One suggestion is to provide the possibility of streaming via the cloud (remote server).

reviews: A transmiss√£o esta l√° a todo vapor, √°udio, v√≠deo, mouse por toque com resposta instant√¢nea, mas o controle da input lag de 30 segundos, tanto por cabo quanto por bluetooth, ali√°s at√© sem controle nenhum, usando apenas o virtual acontece a mesma coisa, e aperta um bot√£o e da tempo de ir ao banheiro... As vezes tudo funciona bem e qualquer tipo de controle funciona normal, n√£o entendo, at√© comprei um roteador 5g mais novo e nada, funciona quando quer.
reviews_en: The transmission is there at full speed, audio, video, touch mouse with instant response, but the control of the input lag of 30 seconds, both by cable and bluetooth, in fact even without any control, using only the virtual one, the same thing happens , and you press a button and you have time to go to the bathroom... reviews: Faz bem o que promete, tenho jogado bastante pelo celular na hora de dormir e realmente fica jog√°vel (no caso recomendo controle bluetooth com suporte de celular). Por√©m, pontos negativos: Pelo menos no cliente linux buga com dois monitores, n√£o impede a tela de bloqueio, e se eu baixo todo o volume no pc n√£o transmite o mesmo.
reviews_en: It does what it promises, I've been playing a lot on my cell phone at bedtime and it's really playable (in this case I recommend bluetooth control with cell phone support). It would also be good for an android tv (there is one for samsung too), or an android "set-top box", or even an android cell phone compatible with hdmi (mhl or slimport), to play with console ergonomics (with bluetooth control of course). However, negative points: At least in the buga linux client with two monitors, it does not prevent the lock screen, and if I lower all the volume on the pc it does not transmit the same.

reviews_en: The app is excellent and has great potential. I come here more to leave feedback, because I didn't find this function elsewhere. The app is not working when the mobile is connected via WiFi and with Bluetooth Gamepad. If you use it with WiFi and Touch from your cell phone, it works. If you use it with Gamepad and Mobile Data, it works. But if you try to use it with WiFi + Gamepad, it doesn't keep the connection with the remote computer or even shows it as offline. reviews: Aplicativo perfeito. O streaming local funciona sem problema nenhum, desde que voc√™ tenha uma boa rede local de alta velocidade (802.11ax ou cabeada Gigabit, minha recomenda√ß√£o). Your computer also needs to be reasonably good, otherwise it becomes the bottleneck for local streaming. I use mine with Nvidia Shield in another room, and it's perfect!

reviews: Faltam Anal√≥gicos tipos os de jogos como pubg mobile que ativa corrida autom√°tica, lado esquerdo da tela como anal√≥gico e direito como mouse, gestos em regi√µes da tela, tocar em um bot√£o e arrastar para mover o mouse com aquele bot√£o pressionado, opacidade por bot√£o e n√£o tudo de uma vez, adicionar bot√µes/anal√≥gicos extras, atalhos de jogos para tela inicial, mas o mais importante √© uma interface direto do celular para configurar os controles na tela.
reviews_en: Analogs are missing from games like pubg mobile that activates automatic running, left side of the screen as analog and right as mouse, gestures in regions of the screen, touching a button and dragging to move the mouse with that button pressed, opacity per button and not all at once, adding extra buttons/sticks, game shortcuts to home screen, but most importantly a direct mobile interface for configuring on-screen controls.

They should implement the option to run the application in the background on the PC, without showing the game on the screen and who knows how to run it on 2.4 GHz routers (Onlive, which was a service like that, ran without any problems), otherwise it is an excellent idea from Steam to the market.

What needs to be revised and the sound that always fails, the developers are to be congratulated.

reviews: Pessoa da steam o app e muito bom joguei at√© Asphalt 9 e COD war zone mais queria que voc√™s poderiam adicionar para poder jogar jogos n√£o steam tbm por que a maioria dos jogos do meu PC e tudo porta e s√≥ dois tenho na steam e que s√£o gr√°tis mais queria que voc√™s botasem reconhecimento no toque de tela do celular para qualquer jogo n√£o steam eu quero muito jogar GTA V no meu celular pofavo adicione isso a√≠ dou 5 estrelas

I really enjoyed it now that I can take my PC games anywhere. On my old 20Mb internet I couldn't play games, it was very slow and crashed a lot, but now that I switched to 100Mb fiber optics it works perfectly with almost no delay.

reviews: √ìtimo aplicativo. Faz o que promete. Li alguns coment√°rios sobre jogar no celular. Este aplicativo √© principalmente para utilizar em Android TV. Voc√™ pode ter uma TV com Android, no meu caso tenho uma smart Box. Com ele jogo meus jogos como se estivesse em um video game. Compatibilidade total com controles do XBOX 360 (do one ainda n√£o testei). Eu tinha um Steam Link, com este App posso jogar no Smart Box, ou diretamente na TV. Tamb√©m √© poss√≠vel conectar Controles e Joy sticks, mas precisara do app Virtual Here USB Client (pago) no PC (steam) e Server (gratu√≠to) no Android.
reviews_en: Great app. It does what it promises. I read some comments about playing on mobile. This app is mainly for use on Android TV. You can have a TV with Android, in my case I have a smart Box. With it I play my games as if I were in a video game. Full compatibility with XBOX 360 controls (I haven't tested the one yet). I had a Steam Link, with this App I can play on the Smart Box, or directly on the TV. It replaced the Steam Link hardware. Just remembering that, like the Steam Link, the game is only good if it is connected with a network CABLE or Wifi Giga bit (5 Ghz). With a common router, the game will crash, it needs 30 MB/s of communication with the Host PC and a minimum of Lag. It is also possible to connect Controllers and Joy sticks, but you will need the Virtual Here USB Client app (paid) on PC (steam) and Server (free) on Android.

reviews: Imagina que voc√™ tem na steam um jogo que possui multiplayer local, porem √© necessario conectar um controle para conectar o segundo, terceiro e at√© quarto player... reviews: Se seu roteador for de 300mb n√£o use esse app. √â um √≥timo aplicativo, alguns confundem velocidade de Conex√£o com a internet com a velocidade de transfer√™ncia da Rede, n√£o importa sua internet, mas sim a transmiss√£o na rede, meu roteador √© de 1.200 MB/S e roda super bem at√© no celular. Try to check the transmission quality of your network. If your router is not greater than or equal to 800mb/s, you will have transmission problems. As for games like knights of pen and paper, it works well that only

reviews: The app is a really good concept executed poorly. The thought of playing my favourite PC games on another device is great but the app is terrible. Constant losses of connection on a stable and good Wifi connection, pixelated images, darker scenes, an ungodly amount of input lag, and more.To conclude, great idea, bad result.
reviews_en: The app is a really good concept executed poorly. The thought of playing my favorite PC games on another device is great but the app is terrible. Constant losses of connection on a stable and good Wifi connection, pixelated images, darker scenes, an ungodly amount of input lag, and more.To conclude, great idea, bad result.

Aqui em casa uso tanto nas TV's como nos celulares.Mesmo na sogra, que est√° dentro da mesma rede, funciona muito bem. Detalhe.... no celular tem q est√° numa rede 5G, pois numa 2.4g, fica injogavel.
reviews_en: Breaks a gallon on trips, but the performance still doesn't match the competitor (Parsec), but it's very good. Some games will run better as they have steam link specific optimizations. Here at home, I use it both on TV's and cell phones. Even on my mother-in-law, who is on the same network, it works very well. Detail .... on the cell phone it has to be on a 5G network, because on a 2.4g, it is unplayable.

reviews: Funciona bem, mas o Bluetooth interfere muito na conex√£o inviabilizando controles para smartphones. Mas a id√©ia √© legal, o ponto agora √© trabalhar pra diminuir cada vez mais a lat√™ncia e estudar formas de evitar ou burlar as interfer√™ncias de aparelhos proximos. Isso, claro, desconsiderando que o problema possa estar tamb√©m na minha rede.
reviews_en: It works well, but Bluetooth interferes a lot with the connection, making smartphone controls unfeasible. But the idea is cool, the point now is to work to reduce latency more and more and study ways to avoid or circumvent interference from nearby devices. This, of course, disregarding that the problem could also be on my network.

reviews: Well. I was trying to reach out some good features in this app while bathing. BUT I Just COULD FIND A SINGLE ONE. Once you realize that YOU MUST BE on your local network to connect to your pc BUT MUST HAVE internet connection to play, thats pretty dumb. It might be useful for tvs (WITH A HUGE PLAYING DELAY), but its not for cellphones. It just ables me to connect(huge delay)my 2nd bluetooth controller on pc. So the point of this critic is: why internet connection when I ONLY can play on LOCAL?

Faz muito tempo que eu esperava pra poder usar o streaming do steam no

reviews_en:
I've been waiting a long time to be able to use steam streaming on my
cell phone, finally this became possible, I did some tests here and
it worked very well, however for it to work in higher resolutions it is
essential the need for a dual band router that has at least

reviews:
Perfeito para quem tem um equipamento razo√°vel e quer aproveitar a 
possibilidade de jogar a biblioteca do PC com a portabilidade oferecida 
pelo celular em qualquer canto da casa, ou simplesmente streamar o conte√∫do 
pra uma tela grande em outro c√¥modo sem complica√ß√µes. O √∫nico contra √© que 
alguns smartphones emaralham o sinal de bluetooth com a wifi quando voc√™ 
tenta parear um controle direto no aparelho rodando o app, mas para o que 
ele se prop√µe esse aplicativo funciona melhor do que o esperado.
reviews_en:
Perfect for those who have reasonable equipment and want to enjoy the
possibility to play the PC library with the portability offered
by cell phone in any corner of the house, or simply stream the content
to a big screen in another room with no fuss. The only cons is that
some smartphones scramble the bluetooth signal with the wifi when you
tries to pair a direct control on the device running the app, but for what
he proposes that application works better than expected.

reviews:
Realmente funciona , superou inexplicavelmente minhas expectativas , um 
passo inicial de um grande progresso da √°rea com grande expectativa depois 
desse sucesso surpreendente.Claro que ainda possui bugs , √© BETA e est√° em 
aprimoramento, mas cumpre o que promete.Consegui conectar perfeitamente o 
joystick , e o PC. Ainda se n√£o quiser conectar o joystick no celular , 
priorizando menor atraso(delay) de conex√£o de controles , funciona 
perfeitamente se quiser usar os proprios controles do PC. O BUG que aqui 
persiste √© depois de uns 15-20min jogando , meu roteador simplesmente fica 
com o wi-fi inacess√≠vel e tudo que est√° conectado nele perde conex√£o , 
obviamente desfazendo tamb√©m a conex√£o entre o celular e o PC.
reviews_en:
It really works , it inexplicably surpassed my expectations , a
initial step of great progress in the area with great expectations after
of this surprising success.Of course it still has bugs, it's BETA and it's in
improvement, but fulfills what it promises. I was able to perfectly connect the
joystick , and the PC. Even if you don't want to connect the joystick to your cell phone,
prioritizing lower delay of connection of controls, it works
perfectly fine if you want to use the PC's own controls. The bug that here
persists is after about 15-20min playing, my router just stays
with the wi-fi inaccessible and everything that is connected to it loses connection,
obviously also undoing the connection between the cell phone and the PC.
